### ChoosePreferredUse() {#af7d81ffe276a47a4226c0f9ee75575f9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>PreferredTuple anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CombinerHelper.cpp&#125;::ChoosePreferredUse (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; LoadMI, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/preferredtuple">PreferredTuple</a> &amp; CurrentUse, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> TyForCandidate, unsigned OpcodeForCandidate, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MIForCandidate)</>}>
Select a preference between two uses.

CurrentUse is the current preference while &#42;ForCandidate is attributes of the candidate under consideration.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/combinerhelper-cpp/#l00610">610</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/combinerhelper-cpp">CombinerHelper.cpp</a>.

### InsertInsnsWithoutSideEffectsBeforeUse() {#abe36a8462243713bdada68a3fc16ee47}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CombinerHelper.cpp&#125;::InsertInsnsWithoutSideEffectsBeforeUse (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; Builder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; DefMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp; UseMO, std::function&lt; void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;UseMO)&gt; Inserter)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Find a suitable place to insert some instructions and insert them.

This function accounts for special cases like inserting before a PHI node. The current strategy for inserting before PHI&#39;s is to duplicate the instructions for each predecessor. However, while that&#39;s ok for G&#95;TRUNC on most targets since it generally requires no code, other targets/cases may want to try harder to find a dominating block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/combinerhelper-cpp/#l00666">666</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/combinerhelper-cpp">CombinerHelper.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
